title: Twitter developing its own status update feature codenamed ‘Vibe’
content:
Twitter is reportedly working on a ‘vibe check’ feature that allows users to set a status. It was spotted by researcher and reverse engineer, Jane Manchun Wong, on Twitter. It seems that ‘Vibe’ could be displayed on both tweets and profiles. 

more…

The post Twitter developing its own status update feature codenamed ‘Vibe’ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twitter is reportedly working on a 'vibe check' feature that allows users to set a status to their tweets or profile.
